class.name: SquirrelWeakRef
class.description: Represents a Squirrel "weakref" object. Points to another Squirrel object ([String] or [SquirrelVariant]), and is automatically changed to wrapping [code]null[/code] if the object is deleted due to being unreferenced. [b]Note:[/b] When stored in a container ([SquirrelTable], [SquirrelArray], [SquirrelClass], or [SquirrelInstance]), retrieving it will return the result from [method get_object] automatically. [b]Note:[/b] [SquirrelWeakRef] can point to [String], but only if it is created in Squirrel, as [String] does not extend [SquirrelVariant].

method.name: get_object
method.description: Returns the object that this [SquirrelWeakRef] points to, or [code]null[/code] if the object was deleted in the [SquirrelVM].
